Class.Name: TimeDelay
Class.Description: Delays all incoming execution for the specified number of ticks

In.Name: In
In.Description: When signaled, execution is delayed at this node for the specified amount of times.

OutLatent.Name: Out
OutLatent.Description: Signaled after waiting for the specified amount of times.

Class.Name: TickDelay
Class.Description: Delays all incoming execution for the specified number of ticks

In.Name: In
In.Description: When signaled, execution is delayed at this node for the specified amount of frames.

OutLatent.Name: Out
OutLatent.Description: Signaled after waiting for the specified amount of frames.

Property.Name: Ticks
Property.Description: The amount of ticks that need to occur before exeuction triggers

Property.Name: Tick Order
Property.Description: Where in the Tick Order this delay should happen

Class.Name: Countdown
Class.Description: Counts down time from a specified value.

In.Name: In
In.Description: When signaled, execution is delayed at this node according to the specified properties.

OutLatent.Name: Out
OutLatent.Description: Signaled when the delay reaches zero.

Property.Name: Time
Property.Description: Amount of time to delay, in seconds

Property.Name: Loop
Property.Description: If true, the delay will restart after triggering the Out slot

Property.Name: Hold
Property.Description: Amount of time to wait before restarting, in seconds

Property.Name: Elapsed
Property.Description: The amount of time that has elapsed since the delay began.
